feature_model.name: Cell_Phone
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Cell_Phone (f_Cell_Phone) :m Accu_Cell (f_Accu_Cell) :m Games (f_Games) :m Display (f_Display) :o Wireless (f_Wireless) :g [1, *] : Infrared (f_Infrared) : Bluetooth (f_Bluetooth) :g [1, *] : Multi_Player (f_Multi_Player) : Artificial_Opponent (f_Artificial_Opponent) :m Single_Player (f_Single_Player) :g [1, 1] : Strong (f_Strong) : Medium (f_Medium) : Weak (f_Weak)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Bluetooth or f_Strong constraint_2:~f_Multi_Player or f_Wireless constraint_3:~f_Weak or f_Artificial_Opponent constraint_4:~f_Multi_Player or ~f_Weak
